protein.specific_function: Clp cleaves peptides in various proteins in a process that requires ATP hydrolysis. Clp may be responsible for a fairly general and central housekeeping function rather than for the degradation of specific substrates

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides

protein_properties.protein_sequence: >Putative ATP-dependent Clp protease proteolytic subunit, mitochondrial MWPGILVGGARVASCRYPALGPRLAAHFPAQRPPQRTLQNGLALQRCLHATATRALPLIP IVVEQTGRGERAYDIYSRLLRERIVCVMGPIDDSVASLVIAQLLFLQSESNKKPIHMYIN SPGGVVTAGLAIYDTMQYILNPICTWCVGQAASMGSLLLAAGTPGMRHSLPNSRIMIHQP SGGARGQATDIAIQAEEIMKLKKQLYNIYAKHTKQSLQVIESAMERDRYMSPMEAQEFGI LDKVLVHPPQDGEDEPTLVQKEPVEAAPAAEPVPAST
